title: Make typing ctrl-? emit a dir listing for the path before caret. Csh does this, and it is immensely useful when trying to complete pathname
body: Make typing ctrl-? emit a dir listing for the path before caret.  Csh does this, and it is immensely useful when trying to complete pathnames and you don't know the next subdir to start the name for completion.  Otherwise, you have to esc, type dir + path, retype previous cmd line, etc.
